item.description: Privacy Policy Pineapples built the Boba Game app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by TPRVC at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

User Agreement We would like to remind you to carefully read this “Service Agreement” (hereinafter referred to as the “Agreement”) before registering for “Boba Game” to ensure that you fully understand the terms of this Agreement. Please read carefully and choose to accept or not accept this agreement. Unless you accept all the terms of this Agreement, you have no right to register, log in or use the services covered by this Agreement.
